entry.title: Wonder How to Make Your Mail Encrypted,lets Learn How to Do It
entry.content:
hey guys , you guys must have seen in movies or heard that mails can be encrypted in such a form that noone else other than who has the key, ofcourse the one you gave the key can decrypt and see it..well it appears too geeky though but its amazingly simple..

in this blog i will show u how this is done.

well you must b wondering what is the need of this well u must not be aware of the fact even your private mail to your friend is being monitored by national security agency or NSA (us).

well to do this you need a mail client mozilla thunderbird you can download it from#mce_temp_url#

when you install this software you need to setup your account so as this mail client can work.in the following screenshots i will show you how to do it.

first thing you need to do is to configure your mail account so that thunderbird is able to store and configure your mails.for this you need to enable pop and imap in your account













































[caption id="attachment_57" align="alignleft" width="614" caption="enable imap"][/caption]

once you are done with this click on save changes , now we will configure our thunderbird to work as our mail client.i will show you how.

click on the thunderbird icon you just installed, a new window will pop out it will look somewhat like this:

[caption id="attachment_55" align="alignleft" width="614" caption="create new account"][/caption]

first u need to configure your key which u need for encryption

now as the key creation is done we can proceed and remember this key creation is just one time affair because your key is valid for 5 years .

now lets create a encrypted mail for this click on write icon on the thunderbird
























[caption id="attachment_65" align="alignleft" width="614" caption="write a mail "][/caption]

then click on encrypt or ctrl+shift+E..

[caption id="attachment_66" align="alignleft" width="614" caption="configure openpgp"][/caption]

[caption id="attachment_72" align="alignleft" width="614" caption="insert the passphase or password you used to make the key"][/caption]

hmmm...after this long configuration we are finally ready to create a new mail which is encrypted. and guys the gud news is that all this configuration is one time setup.....everytime you need to encrypt your mail press ctrl+shift+E :)

entry.title: How to Create a Usb Bootable OS
entry.content:
hey guys you must have been thinking of using a linux or other OS. but were scared of partitioning your hard disk or fed up of low speed live cds.

Bingo! i have a solution that solves both of these problems

we will boot our other OS from pendrive.NICE right!

here i will show you how to do it.

first you need to install a software named unetbootin-windows. you can download it from#mce_temp_url#

then you need to click on the selected file









[caption id="attachment_43" align="alignnone" width="614" caption="click on the setup of unetbootin"][/caption]

[caption id="attachment_44" align="alignnone" width="614" caption="the window of unetbootin."][/caption]

[caption id="attachment_45" align="alignnone" width="614" caption="select the OS and version for which you want to make the bootable usb."][/caption]

in the bottom select the usb drive.in my computer its G:\ drive.

[caption id="attachment_46" align="alignnone" width="614" caption="bootable usb in the making"][/caption]

when the setup is complete it will prompt you to reboot.

during reboot or when computer restarts type F12 or watever key that is assigned in your computer for entering boot menu.In boot menu go and change the boot sequence .

previously it should be like hard disk>cd-rom>usb device.........!

u need to change it to usb device>hard-disk>cd-rom......! this can be done by + or  -  sign.

when its done you are ready to go :)

restart and you have your own working portable OS .

The most important advantage its has over live cds is that it is portable and being a solid stage storage device much faster too :))
